textBox.richText: 4” snow monday, 2” tuesday, and 8” wednesday means that WP could finally open the top. Headed out Wednesday...they had Cranmer, all the Olympia stuff, and Bash and Balsh open. Still a little sketchy at the bottom of Balsh, but hey, real moguls in November? Woo hoo! And got this cool shot of Max jumping into Cheshire:
